Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Bike is one of India’s most reputed 2-wheelers. The Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Bike is manufactured by Hero, popularly known for their technologically advanced manufacturing value. The Bike boasts high-tech specifications like 199.6 CC engine that produces 19.1 Ps @ 8500 rpm power, 54 Kmpl mileage and giving the most superior driving experience to its users. Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Bike is the kind of 2-wheeler that will turn heads wherever it’s driven.

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Price In India

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Price in India starts from ₹ 1.65 Lakh. BikeJunction provides you a complete list of the updated and accurate price range of Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Bike. However, it is necessary to know that the on-road price of the Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Bike may differ from state to state, depending upon their specific government taxation policies.

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Engine

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) engine capacity is 199.6 CC and engineered with Oil cooled, 4 Stroke 4 Valve single cylinder OHC engine. This engine generates 19.1 Ps @ 8500 rpm and 17.35 Nm @ 6500 rpm of Torque. The engine of Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) is aligned with a 5 Speed gear transmission.

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Mileage

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) mileage is 54 Kmpl which is very adequate. The Bike comes with a fuel tank capacity of 12.8 L litres. This combination gives this Bike a good driving range.

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Brakes & Suspension

Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) comes with the top-of-the-line enhanced and powerful braking system. In addition, the 2-wheeler has powerful and strong brakes, giving maximum control to its users. The suspension system of the Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) Bike is also very impressive that ensures smoother drive experience while enabling the Bike to negotiate through rough terrains.

specsContent: Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) is powered by a 199.6 CC Oil cooled, 4 Stroke 4 Valve single cylinder OHC engine. The powerful engine produces 19.1 Ps @ 8500 rpm and 17.35 Nm @ 6500 rpm, ensuring the user gets the smoothest drive-off experience. Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) specifications and features include an advanced tech engine, offering a decent mileage of 54 Kmpl , enabling you to cover extra miles. Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) price is ₹1.65 Lakh in India. Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) BS6 specifications include a total fuel tank capacity of 12.8 L, letting you cover longer distances without worrying about refuelling. Hero Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) comes equipped with Petal Disc Dia. brakes and has a tyre size- Front: 100/80-17, Rear: 130/70-17, giving maximum stability to the user. Xtreme 200S 4V (2023) engine is aligned with the Multi-plate, wet type clutch, 5 Speed gearbox and Constant Mesh transmission.
